short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide spoilers on the WRC platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Disclaimer: This extension is not affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with WRC of FIA.

If you like to see the stages that you couldn't follow in real time, even if the rally is over, you may find it annoying that the WRC platform spoils the winner of the rally right in the header.

This extension hides these spoilers.

(This extension has no data collection. There is absolutely no code to do anything more than what is described.)
